name: Be Like Water
description:
A game about a boy who is inspired by Bruce Lee's words.
"Be like water my friend.." - Bruce Lee. 
The boy changes into a water blob that can switch between states of matter to adapt to the endless stream of oncoming obstacles.

Controls: 
[up/down arrow keys - change states, space - angry mode] => PC/MAC
[up/down swipes - change states, tap screen - angry mode] => PC/MAC
*note: angry mode allows the player to break chest and defeat enemies

Created by: Kimsong Lor, Isabelle Johns, and Samuel Lockhart

Special thanks to Liv Peterson for the voice acting!
